title: Backport of Snow Day Malzahar
body:
I recently played {{champion:90}} with his Snow Day Skin. At my backport I saw that the Poro he summons (which he turns to a Porovoidlinghybrid) was completly blue. Not the blue he should have just a bit of dark blue.

You only have to recall with the skin and look for his Porovoidlinghybrid. I hope this will be fixed because it looks so ugly :){{champion:90}} {{item:2052}}

replies.body:
Morning AllahuAktristana! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of this issue and are working to get this dude lookin' good again! :P
